questions.question: Regarding sector employment in MDCs and LDCs over the last 100 years, it is true that:

choices.answer: the primary sector has increased in MDCs.
the tertiary sector has decreased inMDCs.
the primary sector has trended slightlylower in LDCs.
the tertiary sector has increased inLDCs.

questions.question: According to Rostow’s model, a country with lots of heavy industry using modern technology is

choices.answer: has been supported by the United States.
relies on free trade with more developed countries.
relies on market forces with little guidance from govt.

questions.question: Which of the following is among the factors considered when calculating a country’s HDI score?
Foreign debt as a percentage of income is highest in
Which of the following is considered when calculating a country’s Gender Empowerment Measure?

choices.answer: number of women in elite professional sports
number of women elected to government
access to family planning and abortion

questions.question: The Gender-Related Development Index is lowest in
All of the following statements about the World Trade Organization are true, except

choices.answer: its member states account for roughly 70% of world trade.
it adjudicates accusations of unfair trade practices.

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of a site consideration when locating an industry?

choices.answer: The industry in question is bulk-reducing.
The manufacturing process is labor intensive.
The product will be shipped a long distance.

questions.question: Industrialization in the United States began in:
Which of the following statements about the manufacturing of cars in the United States is true?

choices.answer: There are relatively few factories in the South.
Each plant focuses on only one or a few models.
Factories are more dispersed now than in the 1950s.
Plants are located near each major metropolitan area.

questions.question: The least expensive mode of transport for shipping goods over long distances is by:
It is especially important for aluminum processors to locate near:

choices.answer: is one aspect of vertical integration.
is part of a just-in-time production strategy.
relies upon securing highly skilled labor.
leads to an increase in manufacturing jobs in LDCs.
